item.title: Main Tank Fuel Pumps – Automatic Function of Left Fwd Pump

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: With AC power on aircraft, activate Left Forward Pump or Left Aft Pump for APU operation.
Observe respective Low PRESS Light extinguished. (If left fuel manifold pressure not available, crossfeed valve must be opened to provide fuel pressure to APU from right fuel pumps.)

placard.para: Placard L FWD Pump Switch "APU AUTO PUMP INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
